meanings.sent1: During the yoga class, we practiced various asanas to improve our flexibility.
meanings.sent2: Yogis often hold different asanas to strengthen their muscles and calm their minds.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to mimic the yoga instructor's asanas, but ended up in a funny pose.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to master the challenging asanas was like a mountain that she was determined to climb.
meanings.sent5: The graceful dancer moved through the asanas with the elegance of a swan gliding on water.

meanings.definition: A position of the body in which one stays for a period of time.
meanings.sent1: Sitting cross-legged on the floor is a common asana for meditation.
meanings.sent2: The child held a simple asana while playing a game of statues with friends.
meanings.sent3: The asana of standing on one leg while juggling oranges was quite a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: In the game of freeze dance, the players had to strike an asana pose when the music stopped.
meanings.sent5: The warrior maintained his asana during the entire meditation session, showing great focus and discipline.
